venue.address_2: Exit 19 off Rte. 495. Turn at BKing
venue.name: DOUBLETREE HOTEL

item.description:
Enjoy live music, appetizers, prize drawing, silent and live auction, and a complimentary cocktail.

Pam Cross, Channel 5 news anchor/reporter and Miss Massachusetts will be there.

Over 100 auction items include: autographed Red Sox, Patriots, Celtics and Bruins items, golf outings, restaurant and store gift certificates, TV Diner "Diner for a Day" certificate (be featured on the Billy Costa TV show), jewelry, museum passes, movie tickets, theatre tickets, Daily Show with Jon Stewart tickets, hotel vouchers, airplane tickets and more!

Tickets are a $10 donation

More info at www.projectsmile.org/events.htm

Project Smile is a non profit organization dedicated to helping children involved in traumatic events.We donate stuffed animals, coloring books/crayons, small toys and childrenâ€™s books to police and fire departments for police officers, fire fighters and paramedics to give to children in traumatic situations.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the table with a meetup sign on it.
item.name: Cocktail Party - Fundraiser for Project Smile
